mapper.select: SELECT cfo.ID as id, cfo.customvalue as value, cfo.CUSTOMFIELD as customFieldId, cfo.CUSTOMFIELDCONFIG as contextId, cf.cfname as customFieldName, fc.configname as contextName FROM customfieldoption cfo JOIN customfield cf ON cf.ID = cfo.CUSTOMFIELD JOIN fieldconfiguration fc ON fc.ID = cfo.CUSTOMFIELDCONFIG WHERE cfo.CUSTOMFIELD = #{customFieldId}

SELECT pp.id, pp.pagename, pp.description, pp.sequence, pp.fav_count, pp.layout, pp.ppversion, au.user_key as user_name, u.display_name, sp.id as spid, sp.sharetype, sp.param1, sp.param2, sp.rights, pc.id as pcid, pc.column_number, pc.positionseq, pc.gadget_xml, pc.color, pc.dashboard_module_complete_key, gp.id as gpid, gp.userprefkey, gp.userprefvalue FROM portalpage pp LEFT JOIN sharepermissions sp ON sp.entityid = pp.id AND sp.entitytype = 'PortalPage' LEFT JOIN app_user au ON au.user_key = pp.username LEFT JOIN cwd_user u ON u.id = au.id LEFT JOIN portletconfiguration pc LEFT JOIN gadgetuserpreference gp ON gp.portletconfiguration = pc.id ON pc.portalpage = pp.id WHERE pp.username IS NOT NULL AND gp.id IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT pp1.id, pp1.pagename, pp1.description, pp1.sequence, pp1.fav_count, pp1.layout, pp1.ppversion, au1.user_key as user_name, u1.display_name, sp1.id as spid, sp1.sharetype, sp1.param1, sp1.param2, sp1.rights, pc1.id as pcid, pc1.column_number, pc1.positionseq, pc1.gadget_xml, pc1.color, pc1.dashboard_module_complete_key, gp1.id as gpid, gp1.property_key, gp1.json_value FROM portalpage pp1 LEFT JOIN sharepermissions sp1 ON sp1.entityid = pp1.id AND sp1.entitytype = 'PortalPage' LEFT JOIN app_user au1 ON au1.user_key = pp1.username LEFT JOIN cwd_user u1 ON u1.id = au1.id LEFT JOIN portletconfiguration pc1 LEFT JOIN entity_property gp1 ON gp1.entity_id = pc1.id AND gp1.entity_name = 'DashboardItemProperty' ON pc1.portalpage = pp1.id WHERE pp1.username IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id, pcid, gpid;
